source_objects.title: Interior Design
source_objects.description: Learn how to layout your furniture, decorate, pick the right paint color, update your kitchen, and more.

items.title: BLENDER: How to create realistic BedRoom with Cycle & Eevee
items.headline: In this Blender course I will show you how to create realistic Bed Room from start to finish with cycles and eevee
objectives_summary: how to model full interior scene from start to finsih.
how to add the material correctly and texture all the scene.
how to render the scene and make it realistic.

items.title: SketchUp for Kitchen Design
items.headline: Watch a Certified Kitchen Designer utilize SketchUp from Space Planning to a Fully Modeled and Accurate Kitchen.
objectives_summary: This course will train you to utilize Sketchup for Kitchen Design.  It will describe how to use this intuitive software for all phases of the project:  from basic space planning and layout, through detailing the kitchen, and ending with creating beautiful images for clients.

items.title: Basics of Wood Joinery & Furniture in Interior Design
items.headline: Basic course exposing the students to one of the aspects of interior designing
objectives_summary: Types of Joineries
Cabinets
Upholstery & essential furniture in interior

items.title: Space & Space Planning in Interior Design
items.headline: Basic course exposing the students to one of the aspects of interior designing
objectives_summary: Basics of space planning
What is a floor plan?  What is a bubble diagram?
Kitchen work triangle along with different kitchen layouts

items.title: Architectural Experience Design
items.headline: Learn how you can  "Design Non-Digital Solutions In a Digital World"
objectives_summary: Design Holistic - Building and Interior  Spaces
Design spaces build upon Users' needs and Touch points
How to design human centric spaces ?

items.title: Digital Sketching on Procreate
items.headline: 2D Plan Projection and Execution
objectives_summary: Digital Sketching on Procreate - 2D Plan Execution
2D Grid Plan Import and Size Projection
Texture and Shadows

items.title: Dialux for Indoor Lighting Design
items.headline: Learn and master the art of doing lighting design of your home or office like a professional lighting designer
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, students will learn the basics of working in Dialux,
the standards to follow in Indoor lighting Design,
modeling, texturing of a Indoor office space and

items.title: Room fragrances.
items.headline: How scents influence your performance, wellbeing & interior design experience.
objectives_summary: 1. How fragrances impact your health, wellbeing and performance.
2. How brands use fragrances to enhance your retail experience with their brand.
3. How you can use ambient fragrances to increase your wellbeing or the experience of your customers

items.title: Learn 3D interior designs: Become Master in 3D design
items.headline: Create your own 3D interior design for all type of building and become master in 3D architecture designing
objectives_summary: 3D interior design
interior design application that helps you place your furniture on a house 2D plan, with a 3D preview

items.title: Colour Secrets for Professional Home Stagers
items.headline: Learn the magic of colour, and how to apply colour when staging a home for sale.
objectives_summary: Understanding colour is a key requirement for all home stagers. Colour Secrets for Professional Home Stagers introduces you to the key principles of colour, and how it is practically applied when staging a home for sale.
COLOUR BASICS - Colour is key for home staging. Learn the basics, including how to choose and add colour, how colours work together, and how light affects colour
PAINT BASICS - You will learn the basics of paint, which paints to choose, and the best way to test your paints.

items.title: Adobe Photoshop Masterclass For Freelancers & Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Shydra
visible_instructors.job_title: Online Entrepreneur, Marketer and Professional Trader
visible_instructors.title: Shydra Black

items.headline: Adobe Photoshop cc For Absolute Beginners - Learn How To Create Designs On Photoshop And Sell Them As A Freelancer
objectives_summary: learn Photoshop tools and how to use them effectively
how to design some amazing on demand designs that are trendy and on demand in the freelancing market place to sell them
how to design books cover using Photoshop

items.title: Decorating with Plants for Beginners.
items.headline: The benefits of plants on our wellbeing and how to integrate them in our home design.
objectives_summary: How important plants are for our overall wellbeing according to scientific studies and how to decorate with plants at home.

items.title: AutoCAD , 3DS Max, Revit and Interior Design Test Series
items.headline: The best test series to check your skills on Interior Designing  and CAD Tools
objectives_summary: You will get to know your knowledge of Interior Designing as well as tools used for Interior  Designing such as  AutoCAD, 3DS Max and Revit

items.title: Minimalist vs. Maximalist Interior Design.
items.headline: Find the perfect blend for you.
objectives_summary: The principles of interior design that create minimalistic and maximalistic style.

items.title: Home office interior design.
items.headline: Designing for top performance.
objectives_summary: How to design your home office to suit your specific work and emotional needs.

items.title: Bedroom design for better sleep.
items.headline: Turn your bedroom into a sleep oasis!
objectives_summary: How to design your bedroom so that you can get a great sleep.
